keyword: how many calories in twisted tea
title: How Many Calories in Twisted Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in twisted tea per 12 oz bottle, including carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and variations for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Twisted Tea?
assumptions: Standard 12 oz bottle of original Twisted Tea hard iced tea (5% ABV), no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, serving size, and any added ingredients. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Twisted Tea contains 144 calories, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Twisted Tea Light (per bottle)
Add a splash of lemon juice (minimal change)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Twisted Tea bottle?
faqs.a: About 144 calories in a standard 12 oz bottle of original Twisted Tea.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: 13.5 g carbs per 12 oz bottle, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Twisted Tea have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fatâ€”it's primarily carbs and alcohol at 5% ABV.

faqs.q: How does Twisted Tea Light compare?
faqs.a: Twisted Tea Light has only 50 calories per bottle, with fewer carbs (4 g).
Yes, about 10 mg sodium per bottle, making it a lower-sodium alcoholic option.
